name: WillowCSR™
description: WillowCSR™ micro-encapsulates a standardized extract of the Salix Purpurea plant with 50% of Salicin. Based on the natural Salicin molecule, Aspirin is the first synthetic pain and fever relief drug. With significant dosing levels, WillowCSR™ completely isolates the notoriously bitter impact of Salicin, providing a material competitive advantage to Salicin incorporated food and beverage products The ingredient is optimal for incorporation into bars, shakes, meal replacement products and mix-n-drink beverages.
